title: NHS Covid app may change as rules change, Grant Shapps says News
article: The NHS Covid contact tracing app used in England and Wales may need to change as coronavirus restrictions change, Transport Secretary Grant Shapps said.

title: Winchcombe meteorite gets official classification
article: The rocky material that fell to Earth in a blazing fireball over the Cotswold town of Winchcombe in February has had its classification formally accepted.
